metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0432 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In skb_to_mamac of networking.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-143560807

notes.Note: sbeattie> staging driver, need to confirm it is enabled

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
